projects.name: Petal Vogue
projects.overview: A fast fashion e-commerce platform where each product has a unique page with specific coloring and sizing. Key features include sorting system, search functionality, wishlist management, and a user-friendly cart system. Product details can be edited directly from the wishlist or cart. The platform also features a recommendation system that suggests products based on user preferences. It is fully responsive and maintains data between refreshes using local storage.

projects.name: Quadsaic
projects.overview: A game hub featuring two popular games: Wordle and Word Search. Each game is enhanced with customizations feature to provide a fresh and engaging experience without straying to far from the original game play.

projects.name: Weather App
projects.overview: A weather app providing a 24-hour and 3-day forecast using a free weather API. Key features include current weather conditions, zipcode search functionality, and real-time updates. The app offers a user-friendly interface with detailed weather information, ensuring users stay informed about upcoming weather changes.
